name: Search from Browser
description: open user + level profiles from your browser!

issues.info: If you encounter any crashes, please report it to the github!

plPopup.name: Playlayer warning
plPopup.description: Adds a warning popup if you are currently in a level in game

editorPopup.name: Editor warning
editorPopup.description: Adds a warning popup if you are currently in the editor in game. Disabling will still cause your changes to be saved

savePopup.name: Saving popup
savePopup.description: Adds an aditional popup that allows you to choose if you want to save

saveByDefault.name: Save on exit
saveByDefault.description: If the save popup setting found above is disabled, this setting will decide if the game should save before exiting the current level editor instance or not
